name: part_004
file: tmp_大神ミオ４周年記念ライブ - Mio Forest night party - [0WLlmgirGD8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Ending of the song 'Shijo Shugi Adtruck' performance with Mio, Miko, and Subaru.
Transition scene leading into the next song.
Performance of the song 'Shin'ai' by Ookami Mio.

subtitles.original: ...舞い上がる
subtitles.english: ...dancing up

subtitles.original: Na na na na na...
subtitles.english: Na na na na na...

subtitles.original: 深愛
subtitles.english: Deep Love

subtitles.original: 作詞：水樹奈々　作曲：上松範康 (Elements Garden)
subtitles.english: Lyrics: Nana Mizuki / Composition: Noriyasu Agematsu (Elements Garden)

subtitles.original: 雪が舞い散る夜空
subtitles.english: The snow dances in the night sky

subtitles.original: 二人寄り添い見上げた
subtitles.english: Two people snuggling and looking up

subtitles.original: 繋がる手と手の温もりは
subtitles.english: The warmth of our linked hands

subtitles.original: とても優しかった
subtitles.english: Was very gentle

subtitles.original: 淡いオールドブルーの雲間に 消えてゆくでしょう
subtitles.english: It will probably disappear into the faint old blue clouds

subtitles.original: 永遠へと続くはずの あの約束
subtitles.english: That promise that was supposed to last forever

subtitles.original: あなたの側にいるだけで ただそれだけで良かった
subtitles.english: Just being by your side, that alone was enough

subtitles.original: いつの間にか膨らむ 今以上の夢に気づかずに
subtitles.english: Without noticing the dream growing larger than now

subtitles.original: どんな時もどこにいる時でも 強く強く抱きしめていて
subtitles.english: No matter when, no matter where you are, hold me tight, tight

subtitles.original: 情熱が日常に染まるとしても
subtitles.english: Even if passion becomes part of everyday life

subtitles.original: あなたへのこの想いはすべて 終わりなどないと信じている
subtitles.english: I believe all these feelings for you will never end

subtitles.original: あなただけずっと見つめてるの
subtitles.english: I'm only looking at you forever

subtitles.original: 交わす言葉と時間 姿を変えてゆくでしょう
subtitles.english: The words and time we share will probably change shape

subtitles.original: 白い頬に溶けたそれは 月の涙
subtitles.english: That which melted on my white cheeks were the tears of the moon

subtitles.original: 行かないで、もう少しだけ 何度も言いかけては
subtitles.english: "Don't go, just a little bit more," I started to say it many times

subtitles.original: 「また会えるよね、きっと」 何度も自分に問いかける
subtitles.english: "We'll meet again, right? Surely," I ask myself many times

subtitles.original: 突然走り出した 行き先の違う二人、もう止まらない
subtitles.english: Suddenly, we started running in different directions, we can't stop anymore

subtitles.original: 沈黙が想像を越え 引き裂いて
subtitles.english: Silence exceeds imagination and tears us apart

subtitles.original: 一つだけ許される願いがあるなら 「ごめんね」と伝えたいよ
subtitles.english: If there's only one wish that's allowed, I want to say "I'm sorry"

subtitles.original: いくら思っていても届かない 声にしなければ動き出さなきゃ
subtitles.english: No matter how much I think, it won't reach; I must put it into words, I must start moving

subtitles.original: 隠しても瞳の奥の二人、 このまま忘れられてしまうの?
subtitles.english: Even if we hide, will the two of us in the back of our eyes be forgotten like this?

subtitles.original: だから、ねぇ、早く 今ここに来て
subtitles.english: So, hey, hurry, come here now

subtitles.original: あなたの側にいるだけで ただそれだけで良かった
subtitles.english: Just being by your side, that alone was enough

subtitles.original: 今度巡り会えたら もっともっと笑い合えるかな
subtitles.english: If we can meet again, I wonder if we can laugh together more and more

subtitles.original: どんな時もどこにいる時でも 強く強く抱きしめていて
subtitles.english: No matter when, no matter where you are, hold me tight, tight

subtitles.original: 情熱より熱い熱で溶かして
subtitles.english: Melt me with a heat hotter than passion

subtitles.original: あなたへのこの想いはすべて 終わりなどないと信じている
subtitles.english: I believe all these feelings for you will never end
